channel.title: MulahCraft - mc.mulahcraft.tk:25575
channel.description:
MulahCraft - Get Rich or Die Tryin' - Diamond and comment to receive $250 in-game. MulahCraft is a survival server that allows a player to join with $250 and make much more money by joining a job and becoming rich. Selling your goods either to the shop or to others. Set your own home where ever you would like by typing /sethome. Privately lock all chest / furnace / doors and signs. Feel Completely safe when you own you land and have all items stored in chest. Killing is allowed, but if you live in the city, killing id disabled, so buying a lot in the city you'll be away from PvP.
- MobArena - Tag Team Together and make it far in MobArena to make tons of Mulah! - Suggest New Ideas to Admins! - Enjoy the fun and be sure to be within 20 blocks of the arena to join.
- MineReset - This plugin allows you to go to the public mine and find varies of ores anywhere in the area. - It is public, so finding ores may be slighlty more difficult than normal - 2 mines side by side Resets every 48 hours
- Owning/Buying/Rent/Bid Land - You can own as much land as you want if you simply have the money to do so. - Purchase lots is simple as a click of a button. - Rent land from someone or rent out land you have purchased - Bid on a lot before the time runs out! Maybe you'll make a great deal!
- Any Ideas, suggestions, Donations Contact MasterMoneyMike

item.title: MulahCraft - mc.mulahcraft.tk:25575
item.dc:creator: @MasterMoneyMike MasterMoneyMike
item.description:
@MasterMoneyMike wrote:

MulahCraft - Get Rich or Die Tryin’ - Diamond and comment to receive $250 in-game.
MulahCraft is a survival server that allows a player to join with $250 and make much more money by joining a job and becoming rich. Selling your goods either to the shop or to others. Set your own home where ever you would like by typing /sethome. Privately lock all chest / furnace / doors and signs. Feel Completely safe when you own you land and have all items stored in chest. Killing is allowed, but if you live in the city, killing id disabled, so buying a lot in the city you’ll be away from PvP.

  • MobArena

    • Tag Team Together and make it far in MobArena to make tons of Mulah!
    • Suggest New Ideas to Admins!
    • Enjoy the fun and be sure to be within 20 blocks of the arena to join.

  • MineReset

    • This plugin allows you to go to the public mine and find varies of ores anywhere in the area.
    • It is public, so finding ores may be slighlty more difficult than normal
    • 2 mines side by side Resets every 48 hours

  • Owning/Buying/Rent/Bid Land

    • You can own as much land as you want if you simply have the money to do so.
    • Purchase lots is simple as a click of a button.
    • Rent land from someone or rent out land you have purchased
    • Bid on a lot before the time runs out! Maybe you’ll make a great deal!

  • Any Ideas, suggestions, Donations Contact MasterMoneyMike
